mean_cn: n.脉搏；（电子）脉冲；  vi.（使）跳动，搏动，震动；（感情等）洋溢，充满
mean_en: the regular beat of blood as it is sent around the body, that can be felt in different places, especially on the inside part of the wrist; the number of times the blood beats in a minute
sentence: The doctor takes the patient's pulse to determine her illness.
sentence_trans: 医生通过把脉来判断病人的病情。
